short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to easily access gitlab projects and merge requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is your ultimate companion for accessing projects and merge requests on GitLab.

Key Features:

 - Quickly find projects youâ€™re a member of.
 - Pin your favorite projects with a single click.
 - View all your open merge requests in one convenient list.
 - Instantly see conflicts, authors, unresolved threads, and approval statuses.
 - Copy branch names with a single click for faster navigation.
